review: Dr. Dharit was amazing and quick, and the assisting staff is excellent.  My second time visiting this clinic, the dentists and staff solve your problem quickly and without overcomplicating it. I spent more time waiting for the bus and commuting from Sion than in the clinic. I highly recommend them.
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your positive feedback! We're thrilled to hear that Dr. Dharit and our team provided quick and effective care during your visit. We’re committed to making your experience as smooth and efficient as possible, and it's great to know that we were able to resolve your issues swiftly. We appreciate your recommendation and look forward to assisting you in the future!

Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
As an elderly patient, Dr. Gandhi patiently listened to all the concerns and elaborately explained the line of recommended treatment, its necessity and how it will help in reducing the dental pain which was being experienced. It helped overcome inhibitions and fear and opt for the treatment recommended by the doctor.
The clinic ambience is excellent, neat and clean  and one feels relaxed.
Highly recommended
reply_text:
Thank you so much for your kind words and recommendation! We're pleased to hear that you felt listened to and well-informed about your treatment plan. At White Arc Dental Studio, we understand the importance of addressing our patients' concerns and ensuring they feel comfortable and confident in their care. Regards

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,
review:
All the dentists at White Arc are extremely amiable. They take time to explain the situation and offer choices in course of action, with pros & cons of each.
The prices of various procedures, even if marginally higher than other clinics, are a premium worth paying in return for the individual attention and focus, overall attitude of everyone and minimal wait time.
reply_text:
Thank you for your detailed and thoughtful review! We’re thrilled to hear that you found our team at White Arc Dental Studio to be amiable and thorough in explaining your treatment options. We strive to provide personalized care and ensure that our patients are well-informed about their choices. While our prices may be slightly higher, we believe the value of individual attention, minimal wait times, and the overall patient experience is well worth it. We appreciate your recognition of these aspects and look forward to continuing to provide you with exceptional care.

Regards

review:
The tooth extraction was done by Dr. Dharit gandhi and an external oral surgeon visited for the surgery, both the procedures were seamlessly smooth however complicated or difficult they sounded to me initially 
The post surgery advice provided by Dr. Dharit Gandhi was specially so friendly and helpful.
Really thankful to the entire team at White arc for such a beautiful experience.
reply_text:

Ensuring a positive experience for our patients is our goal, and we’re grateful for your kind words. Thank you for your appreciation of our entire team at White Arc Dental Studio.

Best regards

I've always been scared of dental clinics and dentist but here with Dr. Dipti and Dr. Dharit Gandhi it was easy and painless process.  I did my Root Canal today it was nice didn't feel anything apart from numbness. 
I definitely recommend them for any Dental problems.

review: When I asked for a digital copy of xray ...she took my xray again saying she will not charge extra for it. Dude admit that u dint take the first xray properly. reply_text:
Thank you for sharing your feedback. We strive to provide the best possible care and clarity during every visit. Regarding the X-ray, we offered a second scan at no additional cost to ensure you had a clear and accurate digital copy for your records. Sometimes, a follow-up scan is necessary for the best outcome.

As for the treatment plan, our goal is to provide a comprehensive overview of your dental health, including any potential future issues that might arise. We believe in transparency, which is why we provided a detailed estimate for all recommended treatments, though it’s always your choice on how to proceed.

We appreciate your understanding and hope to continue assisting you with your dental care.

Best regards
